trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged"></xref> event, <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged"></xref> event, or <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理的方法<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged"></xref>事件， <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged"> </xref>事件，或<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you create a DeploymentProgressChangedEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 DeploymentProgressChangedEventHandler 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
